pages.text: Hydrokinesis is an ability that lets gems fight with water orbs, dealing damage to the enemy it hits. If the gem has an emotional outburst, they'll make the weather stormy.
$(l)Gems that are guaranteed to have it$()$(li)Aquamarine$(li)Lapis Lazuli$(br2) $(l)Gems that have a chance to have it$()$(li)Quartz$(li)Jasper$(li)Agate
